ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
To what extent you consider yourself a religious or spiritual person?
Notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Slightly religious/spiritual; 2=Moderately religious/spiritual; 3=Very religious/spiritual; 99=No data

ElementDescription: How often do you go to religious services or some other type of spiritual  services?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=A few times a year or less; 2=A few times a month; 3=Once a week or more; 99=No data

ElementDescription: How much influence does religion or spirituality have upon your life?
Notes: 0=No influence at all; 1=Not too much influence; 2=Some influence; 3=A lot of influence; 99=No data

ElementDescription: How often do you spend time in private religious activities, such as  prayer, meditation, or Bible study?
Notes: 0=Rarely or never; 1=A few times a month; 2=One or more times a week; 3=Daily or more than once a day; 99=No data

ElementDescription: How often do you talk with religious or spiritual leaders?
Notes: 0=Rarely or never; 1=A few times a month; 2=One or more times a week; 3=Daily or more than once a day; 99=No data

ElementDescription: Religiosity/spirituality 5-item Total Score
Notes: 99=No data

ElementDescription: Indicate your general religious affiliation.
Notes: 1 = Protestant; 2 = Catholic; 3 = Other Christian; 4 = Jewish; 5 = Other; 6 = None; 7 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing online; -98 = Purposely skipped online

ElementDescription: Indicate specific denomination, if applicable
How often do you attend religious services?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Seldom (e.g., on religious holidays); 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = More than once a week; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: How often do you seek guidance, help or forgiveness through prayer?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Seldom (e.g., on religious holidays); 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = More than once a week; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: How often do you read scripture or other religious material?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Seldom (e.g., on religious holidays); 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = More than once a week; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: How often do you review or discuss religious teachings with your family or those close to you?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Seldom (e.g., on religious holidays); 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = More than once a week; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: How often do you decide moral ''do''s'' and ''don''ts'' in religious terms or for religious reasons?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Seldom (e.g., on religious holidays); 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = More than once a week; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: Do you observe religious holidays and celebrate events like Christmas or Passover in a religious way?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Regularly; 3 = Always;  4 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: Do you belong to religious study groups?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: Do your friends have similar religious beliefs?
Notes: 0 = No friends have similar religious beliefs; 1 = Few friends have similar religious beliefs; 2 = Some friends have similar religious beliefs; 3 = Most friends have similar religious beliefs; 4 = All friends have similar religious beliefs; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: How important is your religious faith in your daily life?
Notes: 0 = No importance; 1 = Some importance; 2 = Important; 3 = Very important;  4 = Extremely important; 5 = Don''t know; 9 = Missing; -97 = Missing Online; -98 = Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: Religiousness Score
Notes: '-99 = missing; Calculate using x74ki_XXX
